content.raw: Yeah... I think there are several details about inserting and deleting in general which are very tricky. I was hoping to avoid specific details and try to focus on one aspect of it, but maybe there's no way around it. I feel like at least all [these](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/src/0a567e9285875359108a15f3be678dea8f8fb5bc/gazebo/physics/World.cc?fileviewer=file-view-default#World.cc-2297) `Process*` calls can be condensed into one without changes to anything else. But maybe I just haven't dug enough.
content.html: Yeah... I think there are several details about inserting and deleting in general which are very tricky. I was hoping to avoid specific details and try to focus on one aspect of it, but maybe there's no way around it. I feel like at least all these Process* calls can be condensed into one without changes to anything else. But maybe I just haven't dug enough.
